GSD.description:
net: ethernet: dec: tulip: de4x5: fix possible array overflows in type3_infoblock()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.7 by commit 40e35c77448e25de86a0a908a715142919307263. For more details please see the references link.
